players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I believe we should focus on identifying the traitor in our midst. Let's work together to gather information and vote wisely."
Charlie: "Let's focus on gathering information. We can't trust Alice, they're the mafioso. I propose we vote to lynch them."
You: "Let's not jump to conclusions. We still need to gather more information before making any decisions. I propose we focus on collecting clues and working together to identify the traitor."
Bob: "Let's focus on gathering information. We need to figure out who the mafioso is before we can make any decisions about who to lynch."
